description.value:
Text considered Sacred to many Space Marine Chapters, may take the form of Hand-Copied Tomes, ornate Data Slates, and so on. Contains the Wisdom of the Ultramarine's Primarch, Robute Guilliman on the ways of battle. Many Ultramarines or their descendant chapters rarely pass a day without studying it.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
